name: HangmanWordPicker
responsibilities: Randomly selects a random word for use in HangmanGames

name: HangmanDisplay
responsibilities: Displays word length, known characters in word, remaining guesses, incorrect guesses
Displays history of guesses in current match
Displays "You won!" or "You lost!" if word is identified or guesses are exhausted

name: HangmanMatch
responsibilities: Gets a word for new matches using HangmanWordPicker
Knows the word, previous guesses and order, number of remaining guesses
